App Name: Does He Like Me?
Package Name: dh3games.doeshelikeme

üìï Brief

"Does He Like Me?" is an engaging Love Tester quiz application designed to assess romantic potential between two individuals. This fun and interactive app uses a unique algorithm to output love compatibility as a percentage, offering a mix of entertainment and playful speculation in the realms of love and friendship.
